remarks: Obsolete version of ~ df-gim as of 15-Mar-2020.  Define the set of group isomorphisms from ` g ` to ` h ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-gisoOLD $p |- GrpOpIso = ( g e. GrpOp , h e. GrpOp |-> { f e. ( g GrpOpHom h ) | f : ran g -1-1-onto-> ran h } ) $.
$d f g h $.
